text:
Informed | Sr. Ruby on Rails Engineer | San Francisco, CA | https://driveinformed.com

We are an early stage fin-tech startup that helps consumers finance used vehicles. We are a small team of 6 engineers, and are looking for someone with extensive Ruby on Rails experience to join our team. We take great pride in building product that users would love. Our office is located at 1 Bluxome St. near the 4th and King Caltrain station.

Tech Stack: Ruby/Rails, React, Postgres

Email me directly at sandip.agrawal@driveinformed.com or use our angelist link to apply https://angel.co/informed/jobs/167143-sr-full-stack-engineer
